data.name: The New Resistance
data.detailed_description:
Revolution is Evolution.

Change is needed - but without action, there is no progress. Ask yourself, if you're looking for change, will you join the fight?

Who are The New Resistance

The New Resistance was born of necessity; from a desire for revolution; and to free a society from the tyrannies of governmental restraint.

Driven by revolution, The New Resistance are vigilantes. Distinguished by their relative strength, dexterity and speed, they strive to overhaul the system from within. Inhabiting Krupt City, they fight the very embodiment of societal structure as enforced by the Crypto-Correctional Command AKA Triple C (CCC).

Are you ready to rise up?

Play as either the Blue or Red team and fight multiple battles online, against other like-minded players.

Features (Early Access)
  • Online competitive multiplayer with a team of up to 4 players
  • Host and join private/public multiplayer matches
  • Weapon class system (alpha)
  • Character customization (alpha)

data.short_description: Infiltrate. Survive. Battle. Explore. The New Resistance is a colourful, dystopian third person shooter with fast-paced multiplayer game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
